scripts.build: rm -r web-ext-artifacts/*; web-ext build --artifacts-dir=web-ext-artifacts && mv web-ext-artifacts/*.zip web-ext-artifacts/youtube_embedify-$(node -p "require('./package.json').version").zip
scripts.postversion: node -e "let p=require('./package.json'); let m=require('./manifest.json'); m.version=p.version; require('fs').writeFileSync('./manifest.json', JSON.stringify(m, null, 2)); console.log('Updated manifest.json version to', p.version);"
